amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of Executive Order no. 13672 of July 21, 2014 ("Further Amendments to Executive Order 11478, Equal Employment Opportunity in the Federal Government, and Executive Order 11246, Equal Employment Opportunity").
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of Executive Orders regarding antidiscrimination.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Sean amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 213 (Roll no. 226).

action.text: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Maloney, Sean.
